title: Smartarget Line Messenger - Contact Us
shortDescription: Allow customers to contact you using Line Messenger
longDescription:
Let's make it easier for your customers to contact you!

Probably some of your users are using Line Messenger, so its time to give them the option to contact you by using Line Messenge widget from Smartarget.
author: TopSoft UG

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Limited features. Visible on homepage only. One manager.

products.title: Free Plus
products.shortDescription: No limitations. Visible on all pages. Still FREE!

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

enumNames.another: Open chat (the first support manager will be used)
enumNames.default: Open window with support managers list. User selects one of managers to chat.
Use default button text (Any questions? Ask in Line)

type.placeholder: How Line chat button should looks
type.title: Button Type

subtitle.default: Click one of our representatives below to chat on Line Messenger or send us an email to example@gmail.com
subtitle.title: Subtitle

descriptionItem.helpvalue:
Get many more apps for free on Smartarget.online

üëç Click to call - Allow users to call you within one click

üëç Ribbon corner - Promote special offers in one click

üëç Instagram Follow Us - Get more Instagram followers

üëç And more...

manager.placeholder: Upgrade to Free Plus to add more managers

initialMessage.description: User will see this message in chat after he picked manager

enumNames.default: Use default message (Ask any question. We'll get back to you shortly.)

initialMessage.title: Initial Message

Follow these steps to complete integration:

1. Create a Smartarget account or log in to yours
2. Add your website and configure Line - Contact Us app for your website
3. Go to Integration and copy the User ID to the input text box to this page
